page.title: 16Chelmsford Child at School
page.content: I am{9 years old.}I{wake}about {07:00,}read till 07:45. I go down- stairs to{breakfast}on{half a {grapefruit,}bowl of{cereals, boiled {eggs, marmalade}on{toast and a drink before I wash and get ready for {school.}I leave at 08:35. I take 15 minutes to get there. I play with friends till the{bell}at{08:55.}I go to my classroom, hang up my coat and sit down. My{teacher}calls the{reg- {ister,}I go to{assembly,}return and begin work.I do different things - {Maths}and{English}before{lunch;topics, {games,art}in the{afternoon.}There are {3 breaks, 10:35, 12:00,and 14:20.}I play till 12:30 before{lunch,for which I have{jam sandwiches,drink of coke and a{cake.School ends at 15:20.I stay for a{club}and then go home.I play with friends till{tea.I have sausages {chips & jelly.I watch TV till bedtime.
